name: MICHAEL BRONY, Pharm.D.
resume_snippet: MICHAEL BRONY, Pharm.D. PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:  FDA experienced regulatory affairs and drug safety professional with over 25 years of industry experience in regulatory review, promotional labeling, medication safety, and clinical pharmacy. Adept at evaluating advertising, promotional materials, and product labeling for compliance with FDA regulations across biologics, drugs, and medical devices.
